subject: Economics
title: Social Proof: Because Everyone Else Is Doing It
description: Learn Social Proof: Because Everyone Else Is Doing It in one minute.

hook.text: Hotels that say '75% of guests reuse towels' get 26% more towel reuse than hotels that just ask.

buildup.text: Social proof: when uncertain, we look at what others do and assume it's correct.

discovery.text: Amazon reviews, bestseller lists, '1,000 people are viewing this' ‚Äî all social proof.

twist.text: Social proof can be faked. Paid reviews, manufactured waiting lists.

climax.text: We evolved in small tribes where copying others was smart.

punchline.text: We buy what others buy because deciding is exhausting.

quiz.question: Why does social proof work as a persuasion tool?
options: Under uncertainty, humans instinctively follow others' behavior as a decision shortcut
